column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday April 4 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: KY-627 at Old Boonesboro Rd in Clark Co:
column4: Roadway shutdown in both directions until further notice just south of the Winchester By-Pass due to a serious collision.
Effective 9 a.m. Thursday April 4, the ferry is closed until further notice due to maintenance.
